articles.title: Oil prices climb more than 1% to 7-year highs on supply disruption fears - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices on Monday hit their highest in more than seven years on fears that a possible invasion of Ukraine by Russia could trigger U.S. and European sanctions that would disrupt exports from the world's top producer in an already tight market.
